entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Deerwood
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023
